text: Baba Prithvirajendar Singh Bedi (born 1967) is an Indian professional skeet shooter and has represented India at the Commonwealth Games in 2006 in AustraliaKALLAR and in Glasgowhttp://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp- sports/shotgun-teams-for-cwg-named/article6071089.eceBaba Bedi in 2014. He has represented India in several world cups and Asian shooting championships.BEDI, Baba Prithviraj Singh == References == Category:1967 births Category:Indian male sport shooters Category:Sportspeople from Bangalore Category:Living people Category:Sport shooters from Karnataka
title: Baba Prithvirajendar Singh Bedi
